fields.damage_amount: to prejudicial to law and order problem and not public order

fields.case_title: Gopal Suresh Malik vs. The State of Maharashtra & Ors.

fields.respondent: The State of Maharashtra, The Commissioner of Police, Thane, The Superintendent, Nashik Road Central Prison
fields.judges_coram: A.S. Gadkari and Shyam C. Chandak, JJ.
fields.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Amit Karva a/w. Mr. Monty L. Teckchandani
fields.counsel_for_respondent: Mr. J.P. Yagnik, APP for the State
fields.acts_and_sections: The Maharashtra Prevention of Dangerous Activities Act, 1981, Indian Penal Code Sections 387, 427, 504, 506 (2), Maharashtra Police Act Sections 37(1), 135, 142
